Frames And Mirrors

Frames

Raw wood mouldings, different timbers and shapes available
A selection of painted frames, any shape any colour
Stained frames, any shape or shade in a variety of timbers
Hand finished, gesso and gilded frames
Machine gilded frames
Tray frames for canvases
Manufactured frames

Mirrors

We can supply framed mirrors in any size (within reason), with or without beveled edges.

Photo Frames

We have a selection of ready made photo frames to choose from, a variety of mouldings for various photo sizes.
